save.description: Generic action button for 'saving' current item.

cancel.description: Generic action button for 'cancelling' current operation.

popup_menu_open_vault.description: Menu item in the popup to open the vault.

popup_menu_generate_password.description: Menu item in the popup to generate a new password.

popup_menu_preferences.description: Menu item in the popup to open the preferences page.

popup_menu_help.description: Menu item in the popup to open the help page.

popup_menu_search_prompt.description: Prompt in the search box in the popup menu.

popup_genpasswd_title.description: The title of the 'generate password' page in the popup.

setup_title.description: Title of the initial page you get when you first start.

master_password_title.description: Title of the prompt for entering your master password.

master_password_login.descrption: The button that we use to initiate decrypting of sites.

master_password_password_prompt.description: The prompt for the actual password field.

master_password_valid_for.description: Amount of time to keep the CryptoKey decrypted in memory.

vault_menu_sites.description: The 'sites' entry on the left-hand main menu.

vault_menu_import.description: The 'Import' entry on the left-hand main menu.

vault_menu_settings.description: The 'settings' entry on the left-hand main menu.

site_edit_title_add.description: The title of the 'edit site' dialog when we're actually adding a site.

site_edit_name.description: The placeholder for the site's name.

site_edit_url.description: The placeholder for the site's URL.

site_edit_username.description: The placeholder for the username associated with this site.

site_edit_password.description: The placeholder for the password associated with this site.

site_edit_notes.description: The placeholder for the notes field for this site.

import_source_placeholder.description: The placeholder for the 'source' select on the import screen.

import_file_placeholder.description: The placeholder for the 'file' field (which is read-only) on the import screen.

import_file_choose.description: The 'Choose' button for selecting the file on the import screen.
